uchicago.src.sim.topology.space.d3
Class Multi3DGrid

java.lang.Object
  uchicago.src.sim.topology.space.d3.AbstractObject3DTopology
      uchicago.src.sim.topology.space.d3.AbstractObject3DSpace
          uchicago.src.sim.topology.space.d3.Multi3DGrid
All Implemented Interfaces:
ModifyableTopology, Object3DSpace, RelationTopology, Space
Direct Known Subclasses:
Multi3DTorus, OrderedMulti3DGrid
public class Multi3DGrid
extends AbstractObject3DSpace

A grid object that can hold more than one object in its cells. The cells themselves store their occupants without any order. Use an OrderedMulti2DGrid if you need the cell occupants to be stored in an ordered fashion. The object return by getObjectAt is a Multi2DLocation.

Version:
$Revision$ $Date$
